languages.text: "Я встретил Лорд-капитана Теодору во время миссии: части Имперского флота оказывали поддержку армии {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} на одном из приграничных миров. Наше знакомство выдалось... непростым. Взаимодействия с гражданскими никогда не были моим коньком. Каково же было мое удивление, когда, уже после завершения операции, я получил направление покинуть службу на флоте и присоединиться к личному совету Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Я встретил Лорд-капитана Теодору во время миссии: части имперского флота оказывали поддержку армии {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} на одном из приграничных миров. Наше знакомство выдалось... непростым. Взаимодействия с гражданскими никогда не были моим коньком. Каково же было мое удивление, когда, уже после завершения операции, я получил направление покинуть службу на флоте и присоединиться к личному совету Вольного Торговца".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "I met Lord Captain Theodora on a mission where the Imperial Navy was providing reinforcements to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s army on one of the frontier worlds. Our acquaintance was... not easy. Working with people outside the Navy hierarchy has never been my strong suit. It was to my great surprise, then, that after the mission's completion, I received a referral to leave my service in the Navy and join the Rogue Trader's personal council."
languages.original_text: "Я встретил Лорд-капитана Теодору во время миссии: части Имперского флота оказывали поддержку армии {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} на одном из приграничных миров. Наше знакомство выдалось... непростым. Взаимодействия с гражданскими никогда не были моим коньком. Каково же было мое удивление, когда, уже после завершения операции, я получил направление покинуть службу на флоте и присоединиться к личному совету Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: {n}After a moment's thought, Abelard adds,{/n} "I met Lord Captain Theodora on a mission where the Imperial Navy was providing reinforcements to the Rogue Trader's army on one of the frontier worlds. Our acquaintance was... not easy. Working with civilians has never been my strong suit. It was to my great surprise, then, that after the mission's completion, I received an invitation to leave my service in the navy and join the Rogue Trader's personal council."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

Our acquaintance was... not easy. Working with civilians has never been my strong suit. It was to my great surprise, then, that after the mission's completion, I received an invitation to leave my service in the navy and join the Rogue Trader's personal council."

traits.locale_text: "I met Lord Captain Theodora on a mission where the Imperial Navy was providing reinforcements to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader's{/g} army on one of the frontier worlds. Our acquaintance was... not easy. Working with people outside the Navy hierarchy has never been my strong suit. It was to my great surprise, then, that after the mission's completion, I received a referral to leave my service in the navy and join the Rogue Trader's personal council."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I met Lord Captain Theodora on a mission where the Imperial Navy was providing reinforcements to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s army on one of the frontier worlds. Our acquaintance was... not easy. Working with people outside the Navy hierarchy has never been my strong suit. It was to my great surprise, then, that after the mission's completion, I received a referral to leave my service in the Navy and join the Rogue Trader's personal council."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我是在某次执行任务的过程中遇到西奥多拉领主舰长的。当时，帝国海军正在为某个边境世界的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的军队提供增援，我们就是那个时候熟识的。这个过程……并不容易，我并不太擅长与海军之外的人合作。不过，令我惊讶的是，那次任务完成之后，我收到了一封邀请函。她邀请我离开帝国海军，成为她的私人船员。”
languages.original_text: "I met Lord Captain Theodora on a mission where the Imperial Navy was providing reinforcements to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s army on one of the frontier worlds. Our acquaintance was... not easy. Working with people outside the Navy hierarchy has never been my strong suit. It was to my great surprise, then, that after the mission's completion, I received a referral to leave my service in the Navy and join the Rogue Trader's personal council."

traits.locale_text: “我是在某次执行任务的过程中遇到西奥多拉领主舰长的。当时，帝国海军正在为某个边境世界的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的军队提供增援，我们就是那个时候熟识的。这个过程……并不容易，我并不太擅长与海军之外的人合作。不过，令我惊讶的是，那次任务完成之后，我收到了一封邀请函。她邀请我离开帝国海军，成为她的私人船员。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I met Lord Captain Theodora on a mission where the Imperial Navy was providing reinforcements to the Rogue Trader's army on one of the frontier worlds. Our acquaintance was... not easy. Working with people outside the Navy hierarchy has never been my strong suit. It was to my great surprise, then, that after the mission's completion, I received a referral to leave my service in the Navy and join the Rogue Trader's personal council."

languages.text: «Conocí a la Lord Capitán Theodora en una misión en la que la Armada Imperial proporcionaba refuerzos al ejército de la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} en uno de los mundos fronterizos. Nuestra relación fue... complicada. Trabajar con personal ajeno a la jerarquía de la Armada nunca ha sido mi punto fuerte. Por eso me sorprendió tanto que, al terminar la misión, recibiera una recomendación para dejar mi puesto en la Armada para entrar al consejo personal de la Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "I met Lord Captain Theodora on a mission where the Imperial Navy was providing reinforcements to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s army on one of the frontier worlds. Our acquaintance was... not easy. Working with people outside the Navy hierarchy has never been my strong suit. It was to my great surprise, then, that after the mission's completion, I received a referral to leave my service in the Navy and join the Rogue Trader's personal council."

traits.locale_text: «Conocí a la Lord Capitán Theodora en una misión en la que la Armada Imperial proporcionaba refuerzos al ejército de la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} en uno de los mundos fronterizos. Nuestra relación fue... complicada. Trabajar con personal ajeno a la jerarquía de la Armada nunca ha sido mi punto fuerte. Por eso me sorprendió tanto que, al terminar la misión, recibiera una recomendación para dejar mi puesto en la Armada para entrar al consejo personal de la Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン・シオドーラとは、帝国宇宙軍の任務で出会いました。軍が、辺境惑星の1つで{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の軍に援助を送っていたのです。私たちの出会いは…少々難のあるものでした。海軍のヒエラルキー外の人々と仕事をするのは、私の得意とするところではなかったす。任務完了後、驚いたことに私は宇宙軍を辞し、自由開拓者の個人評議会に加わる推薦状をもらうこととなりました」
languages.original_text: "I met Lord Captain Theodora on a mission where the Imperial Navy was providing reinforcements to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s army on one of the frontier worlds. Our acquaintance was... not easy. Working with people outside the Navy hierarchy has never been my strong suit. It was to my great surprise, then, that after the mission's completion, I received a referral to leave my service in the Navy and join the Rogue Trader's personal council."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン・シオドーラとは、帝国宇宙軍の任務で出会いました。軍が、辺境惑星の1つで{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の軍に援助を送っていたのです。私たちの出会いは…少々難のあるものでした。海軍のヒエラルキー外の人々と仕事をするのは、私の得意とするところではなかったす。任務完了後、驚いたことに私は宇宙軍を辞し、自由開拓者の個人評議会に加わる推薦状をもらうこととなりました」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin Lord Captain Theodora auf einer Mission begegnet, als die Imperiale Kriegsflotte auf einer der Welten im Grenzgebiet die Armee der {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} verstärken sollte. Unsere Bekanntschaft war ... schwierig. Die Zusammenarbeit mit Leuten außerhalb der Hierarchie der Flotte war nie meine große Stärke. Ich war daher höchst überrascht, nach Abschluss der Mission eine Empfehlung zu erhalten, meinen Dienst in der Flotte zu quittieren und mich dem persönlichen Rat der Freihändlerin anzuschließen."
languages.original_text: "I met Lord Captain Theodora on a mission where the Imperial Navy was providing reinforcements to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s army on one of the frontier worlds. Our acquaintance was... not easy. Working with people outside the Navy hierarchy has never been my strong suit. It was to my great surprise, then, that after the mission's completion, I received a referral to leave my service in the Navy and join the Rogue Trader's personal council."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin Lord Captain Theodora auf einer Mission begegnet, als die Imperiale Kriegsflotte auf einer der Welten im Grenzgebiet die Armee der {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} verstärken sollte. Unsere Bekanntschaft war ... schwierig. Die Zusammenarbeit mit Leuten außerhalb der Hierarchie der Flotte war nie meine große Stärke. Ich war daher höchst überrascht, nach Abschluss der Mission eine Empfehlung zu erhalten, meinen Dienst in der Flotte zu quittieren und mich dem persönlichen Rat der Freihändlerin anzuschließen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai rencontré la seigneure-capitaine Théodora lors d'une mission pour le compte de la Marine Impériale, qui avait été chargée de lui prêter main-forte dans l'un des mondes frontaliers. Notre premier contact a été... déplaisant. J'ai toujours eu des difficultés à nouer de bonnes relations professionnelles en dehors de la hiérarchie militaire. Vous pouvez donc imaginer ma surprise lorsque j'ai reçu, après la mission, une invitation à quitter mon poste dans la marine pour rejoindre le conseil personnel de la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "I met Lord Captain Theodora on a mission where the Imperial Navy was providing reinforcements to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s army on one of the frontier worlds. Our acquaintance was... not easy. Working with people outside the Navy hierarchy has never been my strong suit. It was to my great surprise, then, that after the mission's completion, I received a referral to leave my service in the Navy and join the Rogue Trader's personal council."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai rencontré la seigneure-capitaine Théodora lors d'une mission pour le compte de la Marine Impériale, qui avait été chargée de lui prêter main-forte dans l'un des mondes frontaliers. Notre premier contact a été... déplaisant. J'ai toujours eu des difficultés à nouer de bonnes relations professionnelles en dehors de la hiérarchie militaire. Vous pouvez donc imaginer ma surprise lorsque j'ai reçu, après la mission, une invitation à quitter mon poste dans la marine pour rejoindre le conseil personnel de la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan Theodora'yla, İmparatorluk Donanması'nın sınır dünyalardan birinde {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} ordusuna takviye yaptığı bir harekâtta tanıştık. Süreç de... Pek çetindi. Donanma hiyerarşisinin dışındaki kişilerle çalışmak, benim için hep zor olmuştur. Harekât sonlandığında Donanma'dan ayrılıp Hür Tacir'in şahsi divanına katılmam için bir teklif aldım."
languages.original_text: "I met Lord Captain Theodora on a mission where the Imperial Navy was providing reinforcements to the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s army on one of the frontier worlds. Our acquaintance was... not easy. Working with people outside the Navy hierarchy has never been my strong suit. It was to my great surprise, then, that after the mission's completion, I received a referral to leave my service in the Navy and join the Rogue Trader's personal council."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan Theodora'yla İmparatorluk Donanması'nın sınır dünyalardan birinde {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'in ordusuna takviye yaptığı bir harekâtta tanıştık. Süreç... Pek kolay olmadı. Donanma hiyerarşisinin dışındaki kişilerle çalışmak, benim için hep zor olmuştur. Harekât sonlandığında Donanma'dan ayrılıp Hür Tacir'in şahsi divanına katılmam için bir teklif aldım."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
